section.name: 8 - Forces
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Relate forces to concepts learned earlier in the course, especially momentum and energy.
  • Explain how forces affect the motions of objects.
  • Given a detailed description of an object, draw a free body diagram.
  • Use a free body diagram to write the equation of motion for an object.
  • Solve problems in which we use the forces acting on an object to predict its motion, or use information about its motion to determine what forces must act upon the object.
  • Solve problems in which multiple objects interact with each other.
